document_title: Alzheimer's disease: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Alzheimer's is a disease that causes memory loss and loss of cognitive functions, greatly affecting the patient's quality of life and work. However, this is not normal aging, so do not confuse Alzheimer's with normal memory loss in the elderly. (first)
One day you suddenly see that your grandfather, grandmother, father, mother, etc., the older you get, the more difficult, easily angry, or sulky you become... That may come from your personality, which has always been the same, but it's also very Maybe they are being silently attacked by Alzheimer's syndrome...
subsection_data:
alzheimer.json. What is Alzheimer's disease?
Alzheimer's is a disease that causes memory loss and loss of cognitive functions, greatly affecting the patient's quality of life and work. However, this is not normal aging, so do not confuse Alzheimer's with normal memory loss in the elderly. (first)
One day you suddenly see that your grandfather, grandmother, father, mother, etc., the older you get, the more difficult, easily angry, or sulky you become... That may come from your personality, which has always been the same, but it's also very Maybe they are being silently attacked by Alzheimer's syndrome...
